author: Ronan McGreevy
title: Owner describes death of seven residents in nursing home as ‘truly heartbreaking’
description: Things could have been different if residents and staff were tested for Covid-19, owner states
content:
Seven residents of a Co Meath nursing home have died as a result of Covid-19. 
The residents were among 13 in the Millbury nursing home on Commons Road, Navan, who contracted the disease. 
Millbury is a private nursing home with a maximum number of 66 resid… [+3366 chars]
